title: Riot noticed any frequent posts lately?
body: Seems to be quite a few posts regarding bot players (on the ally team) in co-op vs AI matches but Riot haven't addressed the issue at all. Not one Riot comment. Are they gonna do anything about it? Can I get a confirmation that Riot are at least looking into this issue?

replies.body:
Hey man,

Make sure when you see these accounts in games that you report them under "Cheating" so that Riot can ban them :)
Just be sure they're not an unskilled player.

They all have such easily trackable names right now too :(

(name) PK (name) - e.g. Micheal PK Brown
(name)(4 numbers) - e.g. Sarah3425

Gettim lads!!!

The most posts I've seen on the Boards is about bots on ARAM. I have first-hand experience on it. I found that the bots always take ghost and heal (if I'm not mistaken), and they always autoattack, never using ability once

Hey kfitz45,

Sorry for not following up. We did notice an increase number of posts mentioning BOTS roughly 2/3 weeks ago.
During the holiday period you are right, there was higher BOT activity and we banned twice as much accounts.
Rest assured we are not ignoring this annoying issue.

Hope this helps
MM
